name: Ayah Bdeir
summary: Engineer and inventor who created littleBits, a system of electronic building blocks that makes learning about technology fun and creative for everyone.
shortDescription: Ayah Bdeir is an engineer and inventor who created littleBits, a system of electronic building blocks that makes learning about technology fun and creative for everyone. She founded littleBits to democratize invention and make electronics accessible to people of all ages and backgrounds. Her work has inspired millions of students to explore STEM through hands-on learning.

detailed_description.early_life: Born in 1982 in Lebanon, Ayah showed an early interest in technology and creativity. She moved to the United States to pursue her education in engineering and computer science.
detailed_description.stem_journey: Ayah earned degrees in engineering and computer science, then founded littleBits to make electronics and invention accessible to everyone. She created a platform that allows people to build electronic inventions without needing technical expertise.
detailed_description.challenges: Faced challenges as a woman in engineering and entrepreneurship. Had to overcome stereotypes and prove that technology could be made accessible and fun for everyone.
detailed_description.achievements: Founded littleBits, created electronic building blocks for education, and inspired millions of students to explore STEM through hands-on learning.
detailed_description.legacy: Ayah has democratized invention and made electronics accessible to people of all ages and backgrounds. Her work continues to inspire the next generation of inventors.

timeline.event: Graduated from American University of Beirut

impact: Democratized invention and made electronics accessible to millions of people worldwide.
mentorship: Inspired and mentored countless students and entrepreneurs through her work in democratizing invention.
fun_fact: Ayah's littleBits have been used in over 150 countries and by millions of students worldwide.

career_path.advice_for_students: Technology should be accessible to everyone. Don't be afraid to make things that make learning fun.

books_for_students: Invent to Learn by Sylvia Martinez
student_resources.advice: Start with simple projects and build up. Invention is for everyone, not just engineers.

challenges.how_overcame: Focused on creating value and making technology accessible to everyone

education_details.study_tips: Learn to make technology accessible and user-friendly

modern_impact.future_implications: Her work continues to inspire the democratization of invention and technology education
